COMMENT_TX: $the 70th multi-homer game of Bonds career
suspended,20070502,PIT08,rain $Game suspended with 2-2 count on Duffy due to rain, resumed on 5-02
Pirates third baseman Jose Bautista left the game due to an injured foot/ankle
ej,gilem001,P,westj901,Called third strike Padres second baseman Marcus Giles ejected by 1B umpire Joe West
47 minute rain delay before start of game

ej,bardj001,P,rapue901,Reversed call from homer to double ej,blacb001,M,westj901,Arguing after Bard ejected on reversed call $Bard's fly ball nit the railing in RF and he ran the bases for a homer; Pit Mgr Tracy successfully argued that the ball did not leave the park: when the call was reversed, Bard ran onto the field and was ejected by HP umpire Ed Rapuano; Mgr Buddy Black was ejected for arguing with 3B umpire (and crew chief) Joe West; Bard's actions were reminiscent of George Brett in 1983 with 'pine-tar' homer; Bard awarded a double; Bard suspended three days for making contact with Rapuano
ej,littg801,M,welkb901,Call at HP Dodgers Manager Grady Little ejected by HP umpire Bill Welke
$Saito left with sort hamstring

Brewers center fielder Bill Hall left the game due to an injured foot/ankle
originally 1E3, changed to E1 on 7-24
originally E3, changed to single on 7-24
fan interference

$Edwin Encarnacion hit a line drive single to LF but the Pirates appealed that Adam Dunn missed 3B

Cardinals Miguel Cairo left the game due to an injured leg
$SS Jack Wilson and 2B Matt Kata banged heads while both diving for ground ball up the middle
Pirates pitcher John Grabow left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
